price: 70. Slechts is mij geopenbaard, dat ik een duidelijke waarschuwer ben.”
arabic: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: in yūḥā ilayya illā annamā anā nadhīrun mubīnun
